description: This dashboard can help troubleshooting issue in k8s cluster at cluster, node and namespace level.

targets.expr:
((label_replace((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"}  + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info),"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)"))  -  (label_replace((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"}  + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info),"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)"))) /  (label_replace((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"}  + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info),"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)"))

max
  by(node) (max by(instance,clu) (kubelet_running_pod_count{ cluster=~"$cluster",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics"})
  * on(instance,cluster) group_left(node) kubelet_node_name{ cluster=~"$cluster",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics"})

sum by (node)(label_replace(instance:node_cpu:ratio{cluster=~"$cluster"} + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info,"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)") ) / sum by (node)(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"})

panels.description:
This panel shows node memory usage:

node_memory_MemTotal - node_memory_MemAvailable

targets.expr:
((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"}  + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info) - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"}  + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info))

panels.title: Memory usage in cluster by node
Memory usage by namespace in cluster

targets.expr:
sum(sum by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", mode!~"guest.*|idle|iowait"}[5m])) + on(instance,cluster) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info)

(
 (sum(time() - node_boot_time_seconds + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"})) 
and 
ON() kube_node_status_condition{status="true",condition="Ready",node="$node"} == 1 
)

panels.description: Number of Node evictions that happened since current instance of NodeController started. Sampled every 60 seconds.
panels.title: Node evictions

panels.description: Is clock synchronized to a reliable server (1 = yes, 0 = no). Sampled every 60 seconds.
panels.title: Time synced

panels.description: This panel shows the NotReady state of nodes. If any node goes in NotReady state, graph value will go from 1 to 0.
panels.title: Node readiness for  $node

panels.description:
record: instance:node_cpu_utilisation:rate1m
expr: 1
  - avg without(cpu, mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter",mode="idle"}[1m]))
panels.title: Node $node CPU usage

targets.expr:
(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"}) - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"})

(node_nf_conntrack_entries * on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"})
  / (node_nf_conntrack_entries_limit * on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"})

avg(
avg_over_time((sum without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) 
/ 
count without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}))[$duration:5m])
)

(( avg(avg_over_time((sum without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) 
/ 
count without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}))[$duration:5m])
)) - 0.98999999999999999 ) 
* 
avg((time() - timestamp(up{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"apiserver|kubernetes-apiservers"} offset $duration)))

panels.title: Error budget remaining for namespace: $namespace  over $duration
CPU usage by pod in $namespace namespace

targets.expr:
sum
  by( namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster", container!="",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))
  / sum by( namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total memory  usage by pods in $namespace

value.title: Click to see Compute Resources for pod

targets.expr: (count by (pod)((kube_pod_status_scheduled{condition="true", cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"default"}) + on(pod,namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_info))

panels.description: This panel shows pod node relation
panels.title: Pod  $container node relation

targets.expr:
apiserver_client_certificate_expiration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"apiserver|kubernetes-apiservers"}
  > 0 and on(job) histogram_quantile(0.01, sum by(job, le) (rate(apiserver_client_certificate_expiration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"apiserver|kubernetes-apiservers"}[5m])))

panels.title: API server certificate expiration time remaninig
API server total requests by return code
API server total requests by verb
API server total requests by resources

targets.expr:
(( avg(avg_over_time((sum without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="kube-system",pod=~".*.dashboard.*|.*.dns.*|kube.*|.*.calico.*|.*.flannel.*|.*.etcd.*"}) 
/ 
count without ()(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="kube-system",pod=~".*.dashboard.*|.*.dns.*|kube.*|.*.calico.*|.*.flannel.*|.*.etcd.*"}))[$duration:5m])
)) - 0.98999999999999999 ) 
* 
avg((time() - timestamp(up{job=~"apiserver|kubernetes-apiservers", cluster=~"$cluster"  } offset $duration)))

panels.title: Cluster control plane error budget remaining over $duration

title: Kuberntes Cluster Overview
